author: cmpilato
msg: More work on the "svn copy PATH URL" case.
(svn_cl__copy): For now, don't use a trace editor for the wc->repos
(wc_to_repos_copy): Reopen the RA at DST_URL (instead of its parent)
if DST_URL is an existing directory so the editor will be properly
positioned with respect to how its driver plans to use it.
